definitions.title: n.m. [pl.]
definitions.body: , in list of Solomon’s imports, 1Ki 10:22 = 2Ch 9:21, AV RV ivory (elsewh. [[שֵׁן]] alone); hence [[הַבִּים]] = elephants acc. to Ges (in Thes) Ew Hi Schr:ZMG xxvii (1873), 709 COT:1 K, cf. LXX (2 Ch, and A in 1 K) o)do/ntwn e\le-fanti/nwn, Vulgate (in 1 K) dentes elephantorum, Targum ; but this very dub.; < rd. Röd:Thes Th Be Che:EB 1154 [[הָבְנִים]]([[וְ]])[[שֵׁן ]] ivory (and) ebony (Ez Eze 27:15).
